column4: Can anyone illuminate me on the differences between lynx and its two varients.
lynx handles multiple protocols, the other handle only https and http
was there something more specific you needed to do perhaps?
ahh :)  i'd recommend lynx myself, but to write that perhaps you should play with the others a bit too
whoops. The name reminds me of the interjection "ech"
I'm sure you could get people to start a wiki article that covers all the counter-inttuative terms.
slrn seems rather intuitive to me
i think it's elsewhere in edgy from dapper btw
